title: Canada - average working hours per week 2019
yAxis: Number of employed person in thousands
summary: This bar chart has 7 categories for the x axis representing Average usual weekly hours, and a y axis representing Number of employed person in thousands.
The highest category is found at 40_hours where Number of employed person in thousands is 7282.5.
The lowest category is found at 41_to_49_hours where Number of employed person in thousands is 1044.2.
gold: This statistic shows the total number of employed persons in Canada in 2019 , distinguished by average usual weekly working hours . In 2019 , about 7.28 million Canadians usually worked 40 hours per week .
